item.title: Report 1: Adversarial mindset
item.description: Report 1: Adversarial mindset ðŸ”—Instructions ðŸ”—A report based on the homework 1 (h1 adversarial mindset) on the course ICT Security Basics - from Trust to Blockchain - ICT4HM103-3003, 2022 Spring, Haaga-Helia University of Applied Sciences given by teacher Tero Karvinen. z) Read and summarize.
